backend/main.mo: Main canister sets up access control and blob storage mixins and exposes a getProjectExportUrl method that always traps.
backend/migration.mo: Defines legacy types and a migration function that discards old state and returns an empty object.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records mapping features to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining color variables, dark mode values, and component defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint with SEO metadata, social tags, fonts, and root mounting element.
frontend/scripts/EXPORT_README.txt: Documentation explaining the export ZIP process, fallback instructions, and project structure.
frontend/scripts/export-codebase-zip.mjs: Node script that generates project ZIP exports with preflight checks, manifest rules, and validation.
frontend/scripts/export-manifest.json: Manifest listing root files to include and directory/file patterns to exclude during ZIP export.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with main routes for landing, inquiries, and settings and renders Toaster.
frontend/src/components/meraki/LoginButt: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with state handling and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/meraki/ProfileSe: Dialog component allowing users to enter and save their name using a profile mutation with basic validation and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/components/meraki/ProjectEx: Card UI for generating a project export ZIP, validating the download URL, and displaying success or fallback instructions.
frontend/src/features/booking/ContactBoo: Contact/inquiry form with validation, service selection, and submission via mutation, showing success state and resetting after submission.
frontend/src/features/landing/AboutSecti: Landing page about section presenting Rishab Mehta and four highlight cards describing experience and services.
frontend/src/features/landing/FaqSection: FAQ section rendering a list of questions and answers in an accordion layout.
frontend/src/features/landing/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links, service shortcuts, social icons, and a smooth-scroll helper for section navigation.
Responsive header with scroll-based styling, navigation links, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/features/landing/HeroSectio: Hero banner with background overlays, key stats, and buttons that scroll to services or contact sections.
frontend/src/features/landing/HowItWorks: Four-step process section displayed as styled cards explaining how the service workflow operates.
frontend/src/features/landing/ServiceDet: Full service detail cards with descriptions, expectations list, and a button that scrolls to contact while updating the URL.
frontend/src/features/landing/ServicesSe: Grid of service preview cards with icons, short descriptions, and a button that scrolls to detailed service sections.
frontend/src/features/landing/Testimonia: Testimonials grid showing client feedback with star ratings and service attribution.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook creating and caching an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods such as inquiries, user profiles, admin checks, and site settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom theme variables for colors, gradients, and component styling including light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/merakiServices.ts: Exports structured metadata for Meraki services including descriptions, labels, expectations, icons, and backend mapping.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/InquiriesPage.tsx: Admin-only page that lists, filters, and displays customer inquiries with authentication and profile checks.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Composes the main marketing landing page using multiple feature sections and a footer.
frontend/src/pages/SiteSettingsPage.tsx: React admin page that loads current site settings, initializes a form, validates inputs, and submits updates, with authentication and admin checks.
frontend/src/types/meraki.ts: Defines TypeScript enums and interfaces for services, contact methods, user profiles, site settings, and inquiries.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from hashes.
frontend/src/utils/zipValidation.ts: Validates whether a URL likely points to a ZIP file using HEAD requests, contentâ€‘type checks, and ZIP signature inspection.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration customizing colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining goals, architecture notes, known issues, and existing feature requirements.
